price: 153. O gij die gelooft! Zoek hulp in geduld en gebed. Waarlijk. Allah is met de geduldigen.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱسۡتَعِينُواْ بِٱلصَّبۡرِ وَٱلصَّلَوٰةِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَعَ ٱلصَّٰبِرِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū is'taʿīnū bil-ṣabri wal-ṣalati inna al-laha maʿa al-ṣābirīna
